tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permission_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR NOT NULL, password VARCHAR NOT NULL, role VARCHAR NOT NULL, device_id INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE devices (device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, os_version VARCHAR NOT NULL, manufacturer VARCHAR NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE roles (role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, permissions JSONB NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE permissions (permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, permission_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, description VARCHAR NOT NULL, role_id INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE user_devices (user_id INT,
device_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(id));

CREATE TABLE permissions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
permission_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (user_id INT,
permission_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES permissions(id));
